Growing Up NYC
  • Patterns

Offcanvas

Offcanvas is a toggle utility that slides the main page to reveal a menu. Users can pass one of the arguments below to determine which position the menu shows up. Click here for a demo page.

'right' => right-left slide

'left' => left-right slide

'down' => top-down slide

    1. 2 Months
    2. 3 Months
    3. 4 Months
    4. 5 Months
    1. 2 Months
    2. 3 Months
    3. 4 Months
    4. 5 Months
    1. 2 Months
    2. 3 Months
    3. 4 Months
    4. 5 Months
    1. 2 Months
    2. 3 Months
    3. 4 Months
    4. 5 Months
<div>
  <div class="o-offcanvas js-offcanvas bg-color-black" id="offcanvas-ages">
    <nav class="o-offcanvas__side js-offcanvas__side"><button
        class="o-offcanvas__close button--text is-active"
        data-toggle="offcanvas-ages"><svg class="icon--small" role="img">
          <title>Close Resources by Age</title>
          <use xlink:href="#icon-close"></use>
        </svg></button>
      <ol aria-multiselectable="true"
        class="js-accordion c-list-box c-list-box--secondary o-accordion"
        data-multiselectable="true" role="presentation">
        <li class="c-list-box__item o-accordion__item is-collapsed"><button
            aria-controls="ages-panel-1" aria-expanded="false"
            aria-selected="false"
            class="js-accordion__header c-list-box__heading o-accordion__header"
            tabindex="0" type="button">Baby</button><svg aria-hidden="true"
            class="o-accordion__caret icon"></svg>
          <ol aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="ages-heading-1"
            class="js-accordion__content c-list-box__content o-accordion__content"
            id="ages-panel-1" role="region">
